thread.title: Banking on Deregulation Is Still a Good Bet

author: Aaron Back
title: Banking on Deregulation Is Still a Good Bet
text:
Ever since last yearâ€™s election, investors in small and midsize banks have been eagerly anticipating some regulatory relief out of Washington. Now some are suddenly fearing they will disappointed by last-minute snags in Congress. The chances of substantial deregulation this year remain good, though.

The Senate last week passed a bill that would raise the threshold for stricter Federal Reserve oversight to $250 billion of assets from $50 billion currently and streamline regulations for small community banks. Sailing through...
